summary: Simple retex of the Dragonplate Helmet with runes engraved on the front. YOU SAW IT HERE FIRST!
descriptionHtml:
I could really never understand why the Dragonplate Helmet\'s horns were made of metal, not bone. Very frustrating affair, so I retextured it.

------- ORIGINAL AND BEST, BABY! ;D ---------

Also, on the front of the helmet is the word \"DOVAHKIIN\" in Nordic runes.
I was gonna do it as a cyan glowmap, but I thought it looked OTT.
I like the kind of pseudo-realistic effects in Skyrim atm, not as fancy/exotic as previous titles.

This is my FIRST uploaded mod ( very simple to start), so I encourage any advice, tips, comments and yes, criticisms too!

Please Endorse if you like!

------------------------------------------- V.1.1 - ALPHA ISSUE SORTED -------------------------------------------------

INSTALLATION:
Simply download and extract into Skyrim/Data

To uninstall and make me sad, simply delete the Dragonbone folder in textures. :(
author: Gooneacehole
